com.broadcom.bt.le.api
Class BleServerService

java.lang.Object
  com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleServerService

public abstract class BleServerService
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a Bluetooth Low Energy service for the server role. An application should override this class to implement a service. A service derived from this class can be a primary or secondary service.

Constructor Detail

BleServerService

public BleServerService(BleGattID serviceId,
                        byte supTransport,
                        int numHandles)
Constructs an LE service given a unique ID. This constructor allows the supported lower level transport methods to be specified.

Parameters:
serviceId - Service UUID
supTransport - 0 for LE only, 1 for BR/EDR only and 2 for LE and BR/EDR
numHandles - Maximum number of attribute handles needed by this service
isPrimary - true if a primary service and false otherwise

BleServerService

public BleServerService(BleGattID serviceId,
                        int numHandles)
Construct a new LE service given a unique ID.

Parameters:
serviceId - Service UUID
numHandles - Maximum number of attribute handles needed by this service
isPrimary - true if a primary service and false otherwise

public void onCharacteristicAdded(byte status,
                                  BleCharacteristic charObj)
Called when a characteristic is added.

Parameters:
status - 0 on success
charObj - Reference to the added characteristic

onCharacteristicRead

public void onCharacteristicRead(java.lang.String address,
                                 int transId,
                                 int attrHandle,
                                 BleCharacteristic charObj)
Callback triggered when a remote client requests to read a local characteristic. By default, this function will return an included characteristic that has been added to this service using the addCharacteristic(com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleCharacteristic) function. Alternatively, an application may choose to override this function to determine a value dynamically and send a response using the sendResponse(java.lang.String, int, byte[], int) function manually.

Parameters:
address - Remote device address
transId - Transaction Id for this operation
attrHandle - Handle to the requested attribute
charObj - Characteristic to be read

onCharacteristicWrite

public void onCharacteristicWrite(java.lang.String address,
                                  BleCharacteristic charObj)
Callback triggered when characteristic write operation is completed.

Parameters:
address - Remote device address
charObj - Characteristic that has been modified by the remote device

onIncludedServiceAdded

public void onIncludedServiceAdded(byte status,
                                   BleServerService includedService)
Callback invoked when an included service is added.

Parameters:
status - 0 on success/failure code otherwise
includedService - UUID of the included service

onResponseSendCompleted

public void onResponseSendCompleted(byte status,
                                    BleCharacteristic charObj)
Invoked when a response to a read/write operation has been sent.

Parameters:
status - 0 on success/failure code otherwise
charObj - Reference to the characteristic that was read or written

sendIndication

public void sendIndication(int connId,
                           int attrHandle,
                           byte[] value)
Sends an indication to a remote client.

Parameters:
connId - Connection identifier
attrHandle - Attribute handle
value - New attribute value

sendNotification

public void sendNotification(int connId,
                             int attrHandle,
                             byte[] value)
Sends a notification to a remote client when a local attribute has changed.

Parameters:
connId - Connection identifier
attrHandle - Attribute handle
value - New attribute value

sendResponse

public void sendResponse(java.lang.String address,
                         int transId,
                         byte[] data,
                         int statusCode)
Sends a response to the client after the remote client has requested to read or write a local characteristic attribute.

Parameters:
address - Remote device address
transId - Transaction ID for the read or write request
data - Bytes to be sent
statusCode - Status code provided to the remote client

sendResponse

public void sendResponse(java.lang.String address,
                         int transId,
                         int connId,
                         int handle,
                         int offset,
                         byte[] data,
                         int statusCode,
                         boolean isWrite)
Sends a response to the client after the remote client has requested to read or write a local characteristic attribute.

Parameters:
address - Remote device address
transId - Transaction ID for the read or write request
connId - Connection ID for the active client connection
handle - Attribute handle
offset - Data offset
data - Bytes to be sent
statusCode - Status code provided to the remote client
isWrite - Determines if this is a response to a remote read or write operation

startService

public void startService()
Starts the service. This method is automatically invoked if this service is associated with a BleServerProfile object.

stopService

public void stopService()
Stops the service. This method is automatically invoked if this service is associated with a BleServerProfile object.

updateCharacteristic

public void updateCharacteristic(BleCharacteristic charObj)
Update a characteristic value or descriptor.
